pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:0.5: 50. The training rule on teaching pointless knowledge
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.2: At that time the nuns from the group of six were teaching pointless knowledge.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.4: “How can the nuns teach pointless knowledge? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.5: The nuns heard the complaints of those people,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.6: and the nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.7: “How can the nuns from the group of six do this?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.8: “Is it true, monks, those nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.11: “… How can the nuns from the group of six do this?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.12: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.13: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:1.14.1: ‘If a nun teaches pointless knowledge, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.6: whatever is external to the Buddha’s Teaching, not connected with the goal.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.8: if she teaches by the line, then for every line she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.9: If she teaches by the syllable, then for every syllable she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.13: if she teaches verses for the purpose of protection;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.15: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.16: The tenth training rule is finished.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc50:2.17: The fifth sub-chapter on pleasure houses is finished.
